languages.text: {n}Взгляд Номос упирается в Осколок К'тан.{/n} "Это твой удар и жажда вырваться из темницы породили нас".
{n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Номос упирается в Осколок К'тан.{/n} "Это твой удар и жажда вырваться из темницы породили нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos' gaze is trained upon the C'Tan Shard.{/n} "It is your strike and your wish to get out of the prison that gave the birth to us."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos' gaze is trained upon the C'Tan Shard.{/n} "It is your strike and your wish to get out of the prison that gave the birth to us."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos' gaze is trained upon the C'Tan Shard.{/n} "It is your strike and your wish to get out of the prison that begot us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: {n}Nomos regarde fixement l'Écharde C'tan.{/n} « C'est votre frappe et votre désir de fuir la prison qui nous ont engendrés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos regarde fixement l'Écharde C'tan.{/n} « C'est votre frappe et votre désir de sortir de la prison qui nous ont engendrés. »
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Nomos se posa en el fragmento de C'tan.{/n} «Gracias a tu iniciativa y tu deseo de escapar de tu prisión, nosotros cobramos vida».
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Nomos se posa en el fragmento de C'Tan.{/n} «Gracias a su iniciativa y su deseo de liberarse de sus cadenas, nosotros cobramos vida».
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: {n}诺莫斯的目光投向了星神碎片。{/n}“是你的反抗，以及你渴望逃出牢笼的愿景造就了我们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."

traits.locale_text: {n}诺莫斯的目光投向了星神碎片。{/n}“是你的反抗，以及你渴望逃出牢笼的愿景造就了我们。”
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: {n}Nomos' Blick ist auf das C'tan-Fragment gerichtet.{/n} "Es waren Euer Schlag und Euer Wunsch, aus Eurem Gefängnis zu entkommen, die uns hervorgebracht haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos' Blick ist auf das C'tan-Fragment gerichtet.{/n} "Es ist Euer Schlag und Euer Wunsch, aus dem Gefängnis zu entkommen, das uns hervorgebracht hat."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: {n}ノモスの眼差しはク＝タン・シャードに向けられている。{/n}「お前の攻撃と、お前の脱獄したいという願いが我々を産んだのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ノモスの眼差しはク＝タン・シャードに向けられている。{/n}「お前の攻撃と、お前の脱獄したいという願いが我々を産んだのだ」
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: {n}Nomos'un bakışları, C'tan Parçası'na kenetleniyor.{/n} "Senin saldırın ve mahkûmiyetten kaçma isteğin bizi doğurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos's gaze is trained upon the C'tan Shard.{/n} "It was your strike and your wish to escape your prison that begot us."
